Package controller

this package contains all the controllers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminAddressController
    this controller lets admins create, read, update, and delete address data.
    AdminBookController
    this controller lets admins create, read, update, and delete book data.
    AdminCardController
    this controller lets admins create, read, update, and delete card data.
    AdminCartController
    this controller lets admins create and read cart data.
    AdminController<T>
    this is the abstract admin controller.
    AdminOrderController
    this controller lets admins create, read, update, and delete order data.
    AdminPublisherController
    this controller lets admins create, read, update, and delete publisher data.
    AdminReportController
    creates and saves reports.
    AdminUserController
    this controller lets admins create, read, update, and delete address data.
    Command  
    CustAddressController
    controls customer address information.
    CustBookController
    allows customers to search for books and add them to their cart.
    CustCardController
    controls customer card information.
    CustCartController
    This controls the information entered by the user regarding their shopping cart of items.
    CustOrderController
    controls customer order information.
    CustUserController
    controls customer user information.
    MainController  

Package controller Description

this package contains all the controllers.
